ğŸŒ Hot Summer Day:

ğŸƒ Breezy Conditions:

ğŸŒˆ Post-Storm Clearing:

ğŸ‚ Crisp Autumn Day:

â›ˆï¸ Thunderstorm Watch Issued:
- Temperature: 75-85Â°F (24-29Â°C), high humidity

ğŸŒ«ï¸ Ethereal Foggy Morning:
- Temperature: 50-60Â°F (10-16Â°C)

â„ï¸ Gentle Snowfall:
- Temperature: 28-34Â°F (-2 to 1Â°C)

- Ensure paths are salted/shoveled for safety

ğŸ’§ Humid & Muggy Conditions:
- Temperature: 85-92Â°F (29-33Â°C) with 80%+ humidity
- Feels hotter than the actual temperature
- High risk of heat exhaustion; provide cooling towels
- Misting fans are highly recommended
- Increased presence of insects (mosquitoes, gnats)

ğŸ¤§ Peak Allergy Season:
- Temperature: 65-75Â°F (18-24Â°C), often breezy

- Consider having allergy medication (antihistamines) on-site
- May affect choice of floral decorations

ğŸŒŠ Coastal Beach Day:
- Temperature: 78-84Â°F (26-29Â°C)

- Be mindful of blowing sand; secure food and belongings
- Sunscreen and UV protection are critical due to water reflection
- Check tide charts as they will affect available beach space

â›°ï¸ High Altitude Event:
- Temperature can vary drastically (e.g., 50-75Â°F / 10-24Â°C)
- Thinner air and stronger UV radiation
- Guests may need to acclimate; remind them to pace themselves
- Unpredictable mountain weather (afternoon storms are common)
- Hydration is key to combating altitude effects

ğŸŒ‡ Golden Hour Perfection:
- Timed for the hour before sunset
- Warm, soft, diffused lighting ideal for photography
- Perfect for romantic settings, weddings, and proposals
- Temperature will drop quickly as the sun sets
- Plan for a smooth transition to evening lighting

ğŸŒŒ Clear Night for Stargazing:
- Temperature: 55-65Â°F (13-18Â°C)
- No cloud cover, low moonlight (new moon phase is best)
- Perfect for astronomy events or late-night gatherings
- Provide blankets and warm drinks
- Minimize artificial light pollution for the best viewing

ğŸ”¥ High Fire Danger:
- Temperature: 90Â°F+ (32Â°C+)

- Check and adhere to all local fire restrictions
- Have fire extinguishers readily available

ğŸ¥¶ Chilly Evening Gathering:
- Temperature: 45-55Â°F (7-13Â°C)

- Patio heaters and fire pits are a must
- Encourage guests to dress in layers; provide a basket of blankets
- Serve warm food and drinks to keep guests comfortable

ğŸŒ§ï¸ Persistent Drizzle:
- Temperature: 60-68Â°F (16-20Â°C)
- Light, continuous mist or drizzle that soaks everything over time
- Not a downpour, but will make guests damp and cold
- Large umbrellas or marquee tents are essential
- Surfaces can become very slippery; use caution signs

ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Unseasonably Warm/Cold:
- A sudden, unexpected shift from seasonal norms

- Can impact blooming flowers or fall colors
